questions: That day Mrs Green goes to Green Sea  _  .
article:
Mrs Green lives in a small village. Her husband is dead, but she has one son. His name is Jack. He is twenty-one. He worked in a shop in the village and lived with his mother, but then he finds a job in a faraway town named Green Sea. He goes and lives there. Mrs Green is not happy about it.
One day Mrs Green is angry. She gets on a train and goes to her son's house in Green Sea. Then she says to him, "Jack, why do you never telephone me?"
Jack smiles, "But, Mother, you don't have a telephone."
"No," she answers, "I don't have, but you have one!"
